action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Iwamoto, Hashem, Ichiyama, Morikawa, Poepoe, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Souza; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Lamosao, Woodson.
